Texts.Eng: Gather or Grow ^orange;5 potatos^reset; and return to ^green;Welchie^reset;.

Hi there! I've not seen another new soul besides that ^green;slug-lookin' feller^reset; in a long time. If yer fixin' to escape this world, I kin help a bit, maybe. Bring me say...^orange;5 potatos^reset;, and we'll talk. A ^orange;Greenhouse^reset; might help you make some, in a pinch.

Thanks fer the tasty tots, friend. As a thanks, you can have this store of ^green;Iron Ore^reset; my grand-papa kept around when this place was still nice. T'aint worth a thing to me, but it'll sure be useful for you!
